Package org.hibernate.resource.beans.container.spi

Interface BeanContainer

All Superinterfaces:
Stoppable
All Known Subinterfaces:
CdiBasedBeanContainer
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractCdiBeanContainer, CdiBeanContainerDelayedAccessImpl, CdiBeanContainerExtendedAccessImpl, CdiBeanContainerImmediateAccessImpl
@JavaServiceLoadable public interface BeanContainer extends Stoppable
Abstracts any kind of container for managed beans, for example, the CDI BeanManager. A custom bean container may be integrated with Hibernate by implementing this interface and specifying the implementation using "hibernate.resource.beans.container".
See Also:
  • ManagedBeanSettings.BEAN_CONTAINER
